feed.title: La Grande Rivière - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY IN EFFECT, La Grande Rivière
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 AM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 3:00 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -16.8°C
Wind: WNW 25 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
